caption.p: Spatial variablity of partial temperature contributions. Ensemble mean annually-averaged partial temperature contributions shown for ( a) surface albedo feedback, ( b) cloud radiative effect, ( c) longwave clear-sky, ( d) shortwave clear-sky, ( e) ocean heat storage, and ( f) surface turbulent flux. The corresponding inter-model standard deviation for each partial temperature contribution is shown for ( g) surface albedo feedback, ( h) cloud radiative effect, ( i) longwave clear-sky, ( j) shortwave clear-sky, ( k) ocean heat storage, and ( l) surface turbulent flux
